properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
S/V MONACO, NINE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT DUE TO STEERING DAMAGE IN 27-57.88N 043-53.29W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6231, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
